page.title: 05Isfield Mill:Corn Merchants.
page.content: The Mill was{built}about 100 years ago. Water power was used until 1904 when electricity was installed.{Animal {food}is made from grains bought from local farms. Fish & soya bean meals are also used & Vitamins are added. Dairy foods are mainly produced with some for pig & poultry. About{100 tons are produced each week. They are sold to farms which could be as far away as 25 miles. There are 2 bulk delivery lorries which also collect corn from the farms. In addition to food products{fertil- {izer}is bought from a dealer in Horsh- ham to be sold to local farmers. Ten full time workers are{employed}& 2 part time people. They come from the Uckfield area. In winter a few more workers may be employed because the demand for food is greater as many animals have to be kept inside.
